attributes.action: to ensure that if a person shows distinct characteristics of risk to himself and others then the parent should be listened to when pleading to have your child sectioned under the mental health act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If your child shows that he is unwell and he is a serios risk to himself and others then a parent should have the right and be listened to and your child should be sectioned.  If this does not happen then the responsibilty lies with those who do not listen and they should give a valid reason for their decision.  The parent knows more than most the mental health state of their child
